Name: Felix The Toy
About the game: Experience authentic nostalgia through 12 large worlds! Guide a small toy into adventure as a mysterious event takes hold. Inspired by Toy Story 2 on the original playstation, embark on a journey where everything is large and you are small! Visit carnivals and even a bowling alley! Each level was crafted with the utmost care and treats the player with respect. So buckle in retro gamers and new gamers alike and prepare for a true retro experience! GAME FEATURES -*Keyboard and Mouse Support *Game Controller Support 1. 12 Large and well designed levels with varying themes. 2. A simple approach to gaming to help anyone of any age jump right in! 3. A soundtrack that is just as amazing as the levels! 4. Two story modes that change things up! 5. A interactive game board that serves as the level hub. 6. Explore the story by reading the lore box's spread about the areas! 7. Authentic nostalgia that is sure to make you smile!
